description:
The MPG Serene Knit Maternity Long Sleeve Cover Up is a cozy and versatile cover up that is designed for pregnant women who want to stay active and comfortable.

  • This cover up is made of a soft and stretchy knit fabric that can accommodate your growing belly and adapt to your changing shape
  • It has a relaxed fit, a high-low hem, and side slits that allow you to move freely and layer easily
  • It also has thumbholes that keep your sleeves in place and your hands cozy
name: MPG Serene Knit Maternity Long Sleeve Cover Up - Women's
